title: Just Touch It?
description: ICYMI -  Connect Station CS100 -  Canon EOS 80D -   Save 10% on the Connect Station CS100 using the code UNBOXTHERAPY10. Offer valid until6/30/16  Had the chance to check out the Connect Station CS100 from Canon, this thing lets you touch transfer images from your DSLR to a back up drive housed in the unit. You can also share directly from the unit to various social media platforms.  This video has been sponsored by Canon.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
